H0.text: Which nation in 2014 saw the abdication of Juan Carlos and the ascension of Felipe VI. Portugal

H1.text: Which nation in 2014 saw the abdication of Juan Carlos and the ascension of Felipe VI. Italy

H2.text: Which nation in 2014 saw the abdication of Juan Carlos and the ascension of Felipe VI. Belgium

H3.text: Which nation in 2014 saw the abdication of Juan Carlos and the ascension of Felipe VI. SPAIN

A4.text: In June 2014, Juan Carlos abdicated in favour of his son, who acceded to the throne as Felipe VI.
